about_the_game:
White Dragon Pack


This product depicts 36 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games.

The pack consists of white dragons of different ages.

Included are young white dragons, both in flight and in combat. Also sleeping. Adult white dragons in flight, sleeping and in combat. Ancient dragons fighting, sleeping and in flight, also saddled with and without a rider. The dragon rider separate. Chests of various kinds, hordes of gold and treasure, diamonds and other coins. Also dragon eggs in various stages of development. Also included is a White Dragon Breath Template, to scare your enemies as you breath ice cold flames across the battlefield.

This pack includes the following:

  • Young white dragons in flight, combat, and sleeping
  • Adult white dragons in flight, combat, and sleeping
  • Ancient white dragons in flight, combat, sleeping, and saddled with and without a rider
  • Dragon rider
  • Chests of various kinds
  • Hordes of gold and treasure
  • Diamonds and other coins
  • Dragon eggs in various stages of development
  • White dragon breath template

Converted by: Kiel Thompson

Released on September 13, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

This product depicts 36 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games.

The pack consists of white dragons of different ages.

Included are young white dragons, both in flight and in combat. Also sleeping. Adult white dragons in flight, sleeping and in combat. Ancient dragons fighting, sleeping and in flight, also saddled with and without a rider. The dragon rider separate. Chests of various kinds, hordes of gold and treasure, diamonds and other coins. Also dragon eggs in various stages of development. Also included is a White Dragon Breath Template, to scare your enemies as you breath ice cold flames across the battlefield.

This pack includes the following:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
